event.description: Manuel Margot strikes out swinging.
Wil Myers reaches on a throwing error by shortstop Corey Seager. Wil Myers to 2nd.
With Yangervis Solarte batting, wild pitch by Clayton Kershaw, Wil Myers to 3rd.
Yangervis Solarte singles on a ground ball to left fielder Andrew Toles. Wil Myers scores.
Hunter Renfroe pops out to catcher Yasmani Grandal in foul territory.
Ryan Schimpf flies out to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Austin Hedges lines out to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Erick Aybar called out on strikes.
Jhoulys Chacin flies out to left fielder Andrew Toles.
Travis Jankowski bunt grounds out, second baseman Logan Forsythe to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Manuel Margot pops out to shortstop Corey Seager.
Wil Myers called out on strikes.
Yangervis Solarte strikes out swinging.
Hunter Renfroe grounds out sharply, shortstop Corey Seager to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Ryan Schimpf pops out to catcher Yasmani Grandal in foul territory.
Austin Hedges called out on strikes.
Erick Aybar grounds out, third baseman Justin Turner to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Christian Bethancourt called out on strikes.
Travis Jankowski called out on strikes.
Manuel Margot flies out to right fielder Yasiel Puig.
Wil Myers flies out to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Yangervis Solarte grounds out, second baseman Logan Forsythe to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Hunter Renfroe flies out to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Ryan Schimpf homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Austin Hedges strikes out on a foul tip.
Pitching Change: Chris Hatcher replaces Clayton Kershaw, batting 2nd, replacing shortstop Corey Seager.
Defensive Substitution: Enrique Hernandez replaces Chase Utley, batting 9th, playing shortstop.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Allen Cordoba replaces Erick Aybar.
Allen Cordoba pops out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez in foul territory.
Luis Torrens grounds out, pitcher Chris Hatcher to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Travis Jankowski singles on a line drive to center fielder Joc Pederson.
Manuel Margot doubles (1) on a line drive to right fielder Yasiel Puig. Travis Jankowski scores.
Wil Myers strikes out swinging.
Defensive switch from left field to center field for Andrew Toles.
Scott Van Slyke remains in the game as the first baseman.
Franklin Gutierrez remains in the game as the left fielder.
Yangervis Solarte pops out to third baseman Justin Turner in foul territory.
Hunter Renfroe flies out to left fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Ryan Schimpf singles on a soft ground ball to shortstop Enrique Hernandez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Hector Sanchez replaces Jose Torres.
Hector Sanchez pops out to third baseman Justin Turner in foul territory.
Andrew Toles lines out to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Corey Seager grounds out, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Wil Myers.
Justin Turner grounds out, pitcher Jhoulys Chacin to first baseman Wil Myers.
Adrian Gonzalez hits a ground-rule double (1) on a line drive down the left-field line.
Logan Forsythe singles on a line drive to center fielder Manuel Margot. Adrian Gonzalez to 3rd.
Joc Pederson out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Hunter Renfroe. Adrian Gonzalez scores. Logan Forsythe to 2nd on the throw.
Yasmani Grandal strikes out swinging.
Jhoulys Chacin intentionally walks Yasiel Puig.
Clayton Kershaw grounds out to first baseman Wil Myers.
Andrew Toles flies out to center fielder Manuel Margot.
Corey Seager lines out to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Justin Turner doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Manuel Margot.
Jhoulys Chacin intentionally walks Adrian Gonzalez.
Logan Forsythe hit by pitch. Justin Turner to 3rd. Adrian Gonzalez to 2nd.
Joc Pederson hits a grand slam (1) to right field. Justin Turner scores. Adrian Gonzalez scores. Logan Forsythe scores.
Yasmani Grandal homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Yasiel Puig flies out to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Clayton Kershaw singles on a ground ball to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Andrew Toles singles on a ground ball to center fielder Manuel Margot. Clayton Kershaw to 2nd.
Corey Seager called out on strikes.

Padres challenged (fair or foul in outfield), call on the field was upheld: Justin Turner doubles (2) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Travis Jankowski. Clayton Kershaw scores. Andrew Toles to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Christian Bethancourt replaces Jhoulys Chacin, batting 8th.
With Adrian Gonzalez batting, wild pitch by Christian Bethancourt, Andrew Toles scores. Justin Turner to 3rd.
With Adrian Gonzalez batting, wild pitch by Christian Bethancourt, Justin Turner scores.
Adrian Gonzalez walks.
Logan Forsythe flies out to right fielder Hunter Renfroe.
Joc Pederson flies out sharply to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Yasmani Grandal lines out sharply to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Yasiel Puig doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Clayton Kershaw walks.
Andrew Toles pops out to third baseman Ryan Schimpf on the infield fly rule.
Corey Seager homers (1) on a line drive to center field. Yasiel Puig scores. Clayton Kershaw scores.
Justin Turner singles on a ground ball to left fielder Travis Jankowski, deflected by shortstop Erick Aybar.
Pitching Change: Miguel Diaz replaces Christian Bethancourt, batting 8th.
With Adrian Gonzalez batting, wild pitch by Miguel Diaz, Justin Turner to 2nd.
Adrian Gonzalez grounds out, first baseman Wil Myers to pitcher Miguel Diaz.
Logan Forsythe flies out to center fielder Manuel Margot.
Joc Pederson called out on strikes.
Yasmani Grandal grounds out, first baseman Wil Myers to pitcher Miguel Diaz.
Pitching Change: Craig Stammen replaces Miguel Diaz, batting 6th, replacing catcher Austin Hedges.
Defensive Substitution: Luis Torrens replaces pitcher Miguel Diaz, batting 8th, playing catcher.
Yasiel Puig walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Chase Utley replaces Clayton Kershaw.
Chase Utley flies out to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Andrew Toles singles on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Renfroe. Yasiel Puig to 2nd.

Corey Seager singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Hunter Renfroe. Yasiel Puig out at home, right fielder Hunter Renfroe to first baseman Wil Myers to catcher Luis Torrens to third baseman Ryan Schimpf to first baseman Wil Myers. Andrew Toles to 3rd. Corey Seager to 2nd on the throw.
Justin Turner lines out to center fielder Manuel Margot.
Pitching Change: Jose Torres replaces Craig Stammen, batting 6th.
Allen Cordoba remains in the game as the shortstop.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Scott Van Slyke replaces Adrian Gonzalez.
Scott Van Slyke flies out to center fielder Manuel Margot.
Logan Forsythe hit by pitch.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Franklin Gutierrez replaces Joc Pederson.
Franklin Gutierrez strikes out swinging.
Yasmani Grandal homers (2) on a line drive to left field. Logan Forsythe scores.
Yasiel Puig strikes out swinging.
